PARAMETER.NAME: REGISTER_JAR_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: When filling in the Jar path information below, make sure that the JAR files are available on the execution server.

IMPORT.NAME: elephant-bird-core-4.1.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((STORE=='RCFILEPIGSTORAGE') AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HBASE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND HBASE_VERSION!='EMR_4_0_0' AND HBASE_VERSION!='HDP_2_3') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: elephant-bird-hadoop-compat-4.1.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((STORE=='RCFILEPIGSTORAGE') AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HBASE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND HBASE_VERSION!='EMR_4_0_0' AND HBASE_VERSION!='HDP_2_3') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: elephant-bird-rcfile-4.1.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((STORE=='RCFILEPIGSTORAGE') AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HBASE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND HBASE_VERSION!='EMR_4_0_0' AND HBASE_VERSION!='HDP_2_3') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: elephant-bird-core-4.9.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((STORE=='RCFILEPIGSTORAGE') AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HBASE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND (HBASE_VERSION=='EMR_4_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_2_3')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: elephant-bird-hadoop-compat-4.9.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((STORE=='RCFILEPIGSTORAGE') AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HBASE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND (HBASE_VERSION=='EMR_4_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_2_3')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: elephant-bird-rcfile-4.9-patched-hive-1.x.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((STORE=='RCFILEPIGSTORAGE') AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HBASE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND (HBASE_VERSION=='EMR_4_0_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_2_3')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: piggybank.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (LOCAL == 'false') AND (LOAD=='AVROSTORAGE') AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HBASE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND ((DISTRIBUTION == 'HORTONWORKS') AND ((HBASE_VERSION == 'HDP_1_2') OR (HBASE_VERSION == 'HDP_1_3'))) AND ((DISTRIBUTION == 'MAPR') AND ((HBASE_VERSION == 'MAPR2') OR (HBASE_VERSION == 'MAPR212') OR (HBASE_VERSION == 'MAPR213') OR (HBASE_VERSION == 'MAPR301') OR (HBASE_VERSION == 'MAPR310'))) AND (DISTRIBUTION == 'APACHE') AND ((DISTRIBUTION == 'AMAZON_EMR') AND ((HBASE_VERSION == 'APACHE_2_4_0_EMR') OR (HBASE_VERSION == 'APACHE_1_0_3_EMR')))

IMPORT.NAME: commons-io
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((STORE=='AVROSTORAGE') AND (HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HBASE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: avro-1.5.4.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (STORE=='AVROSTORAGE') AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HBASE_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_4') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='HDP_2_2') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='HDP_2_3') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='EMR_4_0_0') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT_3_1') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT_3_2') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='MAPR401' OR HBASE_VERSION!='MAPR410') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: parquet-pig-bundle-1.3.2
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (STORE=='PARQUETSTORER') AND DISTRIB[#LINK@NODE.ASSOCIATED_PIG_LOAD.DISTRIBUTION, #LINK@NODE.ASSOCIATED_PIG_LOAD.PIG_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM') AND (#LINK@NODE.ASSOCIATED_PIG_LOAD.PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1') AND (#LINK@NODE.ASSOCIATED_PIG_LOAD.PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_4') AND (#LINK@NODE.ASSOCIATED_PIG_LOAD.PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1') AND (#LINK@NODE.ASSOCIATED_PIG_LOAD.PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5')
